segments.text: Good morning , Jamie . What time is it now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What is today's schedule ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have two meetings today . One is at 10 am , and the other is at 2 pm . After the meeting , you will have dinner with Mr . Brown at the Chinese restaurant in Sister Hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Can you prepare things for the meeting in the meeting room ? Make enough copies of the handouts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Do you need the OHP ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I am going to show them some slides in the meeting . Can you call Mr . Brown to remind him of the dinner this evening ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Do you want to ask the receptionist to wait for our customers at the receptionist counter before the meeting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be great ! You are really a good employee .
segments.speaker: S2
